basics.name: Bernard C. Narceda
basics.label: Computer Engineer
basics.summary: Bernard C. Narceda is a Computer Engineer based on the Philippines. He is willing to utilize his skills, talents, and knowledge he developed and instilled through college for any jobs within the computer industry.

location.address: Blk. 26 Lot. 24, Phase 3-A Extension, Palmera Springs Subdivision, Brgy. 175 Camarin

education.institution: Polytechnic University of the Philippines Senior High School

references.reference: Bernard is a close friend of mine. I'm really impressed with his knowledge when it comes to computer. He's a big help whenever there's a problem related with computers. He's always willing to help. Email address: qkacrampatanta@tip.edu.ph
references.name: Kaila Ann L. Crampatanta

references.reference: Bernard is very reliable especially when our company needs troubleshooting with our website. He's truly capable of various computer skills that's really becoming a popular field within industries. Email: jbernal0420@gmail.com
references.name: Joseph B. Cammayo
